jj.aboutMeTextShort: Welcome to my travel blog. My name is Janka and my life is closely related to getting to know our beautiful planet earth and new cultures. I discovered my passion for travelling in my early teenage years. Since then, this passion has been constantly growing.
jj.aboutMeTextLong1: Welcome to my travel blog. My name is Janka and my life is closely related to getting to know our beautiful planet earth and new cultures. I discovered my passion for travelling in my early teenage years. Since then, this passion has been constantly growing.
jj.aboutMeTextLong2: I come from the capital of a small European country Slovakia, Bratislava. And my wandering legs have taken me to many places in Europe, North America and Asia. I have tried living in cold Norway and diverse USA. Recently, I quit my corporate job, got a one way ticket to Bangkok and I am traveling around the world with focus on Southeast Asia, New Zealand and Latin America.
jj.aboutMeTextLong3: My family and friends consider me as a reliable travel organizer. They do not need to arrange or think about anything, because they can simply rely on me. It gives me absolute joy and that is why I decided to share this passion also with you.
